vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
θύϊνος [ῠ], η, ον,
of the tree θύον (which see), δένδρα, ξύλον, [Refs 1st c.BC+]; made of this wood, [NT+3rd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: citron, from the citron tree (a scented wood)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
citron, from the citron tree (a scented wood)
thyme, of θυια, thya, an aromatic evergreen tree, arbor vitae, resembling the cedar, and found in Libya, Rev. 18:12*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 出自柑橘樹的, 芳香的 (啟 18:12)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 出自柑橘树的, 芳香的 (启 18:12)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cây thơm dùng như hương; một cây (Citrus) thơm (Hapax)
